quote_first: “Oh yes. His clocks were set at one minute past five, four minutes past five and
quote_last: . That was the combination number of a safe, 515457. The safe was concealed behind a reproduction of the Mona Lisa. Inside the safe,” continued Poirot, with distaste, “were the Crown Jewels of the Russian Royal Family."
title: The clocks
author: Agatha Christie
